summary: Defines a reusable base class for lightweight, periodic background tasks within the Prefect REST API, handling the execution loop, start/stop lifecycle, and signal integration, along with utilities to launch and terminate groups of such services.
business_intent: Provide a consistent, asynchronous framework for managing recurring server-side operations (e.g., cleanup, monitoring) in Prefect, ensuring they can be started, stopped, and coordinated reliably.
